title: Boundedness of the p-primary torsion of the Brauer groups of K3 surfaces
authors: Christopher D. Lazda and Alexei N. Skorobogatov
abstract:
We prove that the transcendental Brauer group of a K3 surface X over a
finitely generated field k is finite, unless k has positive characteristic p
and X is supersingular, in which case it is annihilated by p.
